settings.like_own_posts_help: When enabled, subject to permission, users may 'like' their own posts on the forum. To prevent users placing a 'like' on their own posts, disable this setting.
settings.like_own_posts_label: Users may like their own posts

post.liked_by_text: {count, plural, one {{users} likes this} other {{users} like this}}.

settings.notify_post_liked_label: Someone likes one of my posts
